controllerIdentification.description: This Privacy Policy governs the collection and processing of personal data carried out through the website https://invited.es, as well as in the various interactions that the user may have with Invited.es.

collectedData.title: 2. PERSONAL DATA COLLECTED
collectedData.intro: Depending on the features the user uses on the Website, different types of personal data may be collected, such as:
collectedData.type1: Contact data: name, surname, email address, phone number, and postal address.
collectedData.type2: Browsing data: IP address, browser, device type, operating system, browsing history.
collectedData.type3: Customization and service data: information provided for the creation and management of digital invitations.
collectedData.type4: Contractual relationship data: information required for billing, payments, and managing the user relationship.

purpose.title: 3. PURPOSE OF DATA PROCESSING
purpose.intro: The personal data collected will be processed for the following purposes:
purpose.purpose1: Management of the digital invitation service.
purpose.purpose4: Sending commercial communications with express consent.

lawfulBasis.title: 4. LAWFUL BASIS FOR PROCESSING
lawfulBasis.intro: The legal basis for the processing of personal data varies depending on the purpose:
lawfulBasis.basis1: Service management and contractual relationship: Performance of a contract.
lawfulBasis.basis4: Compliance with legal obligations: Legal compliance.

dataRetention.title: 5. DATA RETENTION
dataRetention.text: Personal data will be retained for the duration of the contractual relationship and until the user requests its deletion. Data will also be retained for the legally required periods.

dataDisclosure.title: 6. DATA DISCLOSURE TO THIRD PARTIES
dataDisclosure.intro: Invited.es will disclose personal data only to:
dataDisclosure.disclosure2: Public bodies when required by law.
dataDisclosure.disclosure3: Partners for managing the digital invitation.

userRights.title: 7. USER RIGHTS
userRights.intro: The user may exercise the following rights:
userRights.right3: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten).
userRights.additionalText: To exercise these rights, the user may send an email to contacto@invited.es, indicating 'Data Protection' in the subject line and attaching a copy of their ID document.

dataSecurity.title: 8. DATA SECURITY
dataSecurity.text: Invited.es commits to implementing technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of personal data.

cookies.title: 9. USE OF COOKIES
cookies.text: For more information, please see our Cookie Policy.

policyUpdate.title: 10. PRIVACY POLICY UPDATE
policyUpdate.text: This policy may be modified. Relevant changes will be communicated on the website.
